ygData.subject: RE: Root, pumice stones.
ygData.msgSnippet: John, do you by chance know how one uses a potion?  I tried rt clicking on one in an open inventory slot last nite with no songs playing and nothing happened.
ygData.messageBody:
John, do you by chance know how one uses a potion? I tried rt clicking on
one in an open inventory slot last nite with no songs playing and nothing
happened. Any ideas?

Thanks!

Dean
Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 1:01 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Root, pumice stones.


From: <kim@...>

On Thu, 14 Oct 1999, kbachman wrote:
>
> Where do you find pumice stones?

Any of the alchemist merchants carry it. In Freeport, it is
near the monk's guild. Head North and hang a right as if you
were going to East Freeport. Straight ahead is a sign saying
"East Freeport." On the left is a opening in the wall with a
building beyond it. The alchemists are in there, selling
other useful (or useless) items such as gate and invisibility
potions, harvest and spring crystals, etc.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
